meanings.definition: To belong as a part, right, possession, attribute, or function.
meanings.sent1: The crown jewels appertain to the royal family.
meanings.sent2: The key appertains to the locked door.
meanings.sent3: It would appertain to a cat to chase a mouse.
meanings.sent4: The responsibility of a leader appertains to guiding their team.
meanings.sent5: The role of a teacher appertains to educating students.

meanings.sent1: The new policy appertains to all employees.
meanings.sent2: The safety regulations appertain to everyone in the building.
meanings.sent3: It might appertain to a student to study for the upcoming exam.
meanings.sent4: The success of a project appertains to effective teamwork.
meanings.sent5: The happiness of a family appertains to spending quality time together.
